#summary Webmin WebGUI testing using ab (ApacheBench).

= Introduction =

This page documents benchmark testing results for the Webmin based web-GUI included in TinyBSD_AP.  The web server is Perl based MiniServ.


= TinyBSD_AP 0.9 =
